definition: to harmonize/to reconcile/to blend/to suit well/to adjust/to regulate/to season (food)/to provoke/to incite
to transfer/to move (troops or cadres)/to investigate/to enquire into/accent/view/argument/key (in music)/mode (music)/tune/tone/melody
taste/smell/(fig.) (noun suffix) feel/quality/sense/(TCM) classifier for ingredients of a medicine prescription

sentences.english: No Atificial Flavors, No Preservatives, No Yeast or Gluten.
sentences.chinese: 不含人工調味劑，防腐劑，酵母以及谷膠蛋白。

sentences.english: Coat barbecue food with a thick sauce.
sentences.chinese: 給燒烤食品添加厚厚的調味劑。

sentences.english: We don't use any artificial flavourings in our products.
sentences.chinese: 我們的產品不使用任何人工調味劑。

sentences.english: Try adding flavors to your cheese by adding herbs and spices.
sentences.chinese: 可以嘗試加入香料和調味劑來增加奶酪的風味。

sentences.english: Maybe we can treat it as condiment of our life.
sentences.chinese: 也許我們可以把它當作我們生活的調味劑。

sentences.english: BVO is a food additive used in flavouring for beverages.
sentences.chinese: 溴化植物油是在製造飲料調味劑時使用的食物添加劑。

definition: to refresh and clear the mind (idiom)/invigorating/bracing
to reconstitute (a powdered beverage) by adding water, milk etc
